findings.title: Type Inconsistency Of IVoteEscrow::locked()
findings.description: In the Convex-Frax Staking protocol, there is a type inconsistency vulnerability in the calling external interfaces of the FxsDepositor contract's initialLock() routine.

findings.title: Accommodation Of Non-ERC20-Compliant Tokens
findings.description: The transfer function may not comply with ERC-20 standard and may cause issues if not handled properly.

findings.title: Meaningful Events For Important State Changes
findings.description: The audit report highlights the lack of meaningful events to reflect changes in system-wide parameters or settings in several privileged routines.

findings.title: Revisited Reentrancy Protection In Current Implementation
findings.description: Potential reentrancy risk in `lockAdditional()` routine of `StakingProxyUniV3` contract due to non-adherence to checks-effects-interactions principle, allowing malicious contracts to re-enter the vulnerable contract.
